titles.title: Air Guard STATUS Act of 2023
Air Guard Standardizing Tuition Assistance To Unify the Services Act of 2023
Air Guard STATUS Act of 2023
A bill to require the Secretary of the Air Force to establish a permanent program to provide tuition assistance to members of the Air National Guard.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Air Guard Standardizing Tuition Assistance To Unify the Services Act of 2023 or the Air Guard STATUS Act of 2023
This bill requires the Department of the Air Force to establish a permanent program to pay all or a portion of tuition or expenses at an educational institution for members of the Air National Guard who are in compliance with training requirements.
